Text: Totally excited about this! Been donwloading it for almost 3 days now (im on 12%), im gonna seed this in like for ever when im done! PARTY!

Finaly finished!! Yeah...  but! THe files are packed (I belive) in a mkv format... And my winrar does not know how to unpack that kind off files... Anyone know what program might do it??? i tried mkw audio compression tool, but that didnt work... :P Please help!!!
mkv is a type of video file. You will have to downloa d the video codecs for it. I believe videolan will work for it.
.mkv isn't a video codec; it's a container format. Most of the highest-quality anime is released in mkv container.

To play the mkv format  you can use VLC or CCCP players. The subs come out better on CCCP  but you can play a larger variety of formats on VLC. Go here to try out both!

http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
http://www.cccp-project.net/
Plays right off the bat with VLC, nothing else to fiddle with. Standard stuff really.
